channel.title: Comments on: Feelings
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I am happy to hear you have returned. I hate the fact that when your heart falls asleep, just like a limb that has been under pressure too long, waking up is necessarily painful. I know what you mean. But I am hopeful for us all, nonetheless. Supportive Hugs!!!
item.content:encoded: I am happy to hear you have returned. I hate the fact that when your heart falls asleep, just like a limb that has been under pressure too long, waking up is necessarily painful. I know what you mean. But I am hopeful for us all, nonetheless. Supportive Hugs!!!
